title: Alpha Client Crashing
body: So for some reason, my alpha client wouldn't update when I opened it, so I reinstalled the client itself but now it won't launch the game at all. What do I do?

replies.body: Can you give me a bit more detail around the "it won't launch the game at all"?
I get a bag splat as soon as I click the alpha client

I saw this on another post, tried it and it fixed my problem.
try going to the normal client, not the alpha one, and then clicking the repair option. 
That's what worked for me. It took about 40 min, but it did work.
It's frustrating; I've been having the same problem for days now!
